analysis.description: FreezableToken.toKey (/unique_chucks/6/0xf470fb17508ca92447764e276fb18b74d6e0a20b.sol#514-529) is declared view but contains assembly code

FreezableToken.releaseOnce (/unique_chucks/6/0xf470fb17508ca92447764e276fb18b74d6e0a20b.sol#476-498) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(uint64(block.timestamp) > head) (/unique_chucks/6/0xf470fb17508ca92447764e276fb18b74d6e0a20b.sol#481-482)

FreezableToken.releaseAll (/unique_chucks/6/0xf470fb17508ca92447764e276fb18b74d6e0a20b.sol#504-513) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- release != 0 && block.timestamp > release (/unique_chucks/6/0xf470fb17508ca92447764e276fb18b74d6e0a20b.sol#507-513)

FreezableToken.freeze (/unique_chucks/6/0xf470fb17508ca92447764e276fb18b74d6e0a20b.sol#529-564) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_until > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/6/0xf470fb17508ca92447764e276fb18b74d6e0a20b.sol#530-533)
